text:
#ClarkCounty & @SNHDinfo say Cashman Ctr. #COVID19 first dose #vaccine site to run Wednesday through Sunday next week for:
▪️Seniors over 70
▪️Health care workers
▪️Public safety & security
▪️Frontline support groups

#Vaccines by appointment only: https://t.co/5hXYGOFCm9
